Articles.Content: The chalenge is very simple go 1000m/s or faster when your below 18km and only use air-breathing engines The farther the range the better but if you get to that speed before you get to the islands thats fine too. I have a plane that can go to 1100m/s and can go 2/3 of the way around Kerbin. SAS systems only no other flight control things so no RCS. and no mods. Just the basic stuff. I don't know how to do a screenshot so I can't Show you guys a picture intell i figure it out. Sorry.![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

Screenshot is F1 and to get rid of hud is F2.

and to put a picture here you have to upload it to an image hosting site like imgur.com
